tuv.seg: Kale and Quinoa Salad
甘蓝藜麦沙拉做法
I created this speedy, simple dish with Marisa Miller Wolfson in mind.
我记住了Marisa Miller Wolfson的蔬菜做法，然后我创造这种简单、快速的沙拉做法。
It features two -- no, three -- of her vegan faves -- quinoa, kale and nutritional yeast.
它有两个特色，噢，不，三个Marisa作为素食主义者的最爱，藜麦、橄榄菜、营养酵母。
Vegucate yourself -- nutritional yeast is not weird.
为自己做蔬菜美食，用营养酵母并不奇怪。
It provides a big B-12 boost and terrific cheesy flavor sans animal.
它能够提供大量的B-12，和大量的无动物脂肪的干酪质口味。
What's not to love?
那有什么是不能喜爱它的呢？
Tart this dish up with a handful of your favorite chopped herbs, pair it with grilled vegetables or tempeh or serve with a salad.
先给盘子上用切好的香草增加香味，然后配上烤过的蔬菜和豆豉。
1 cup quinoa, rinsed in and drained
1杯藜麦，冲洗再去水。
2 cups water or vegetable broth
2杯水或是蔬菜汤。
1/3 cup pine nuts
1/3杯松子。
2 tablespoons olive oil
2大汤匙的橄榄油。
2 cloves garlic, chopped
2个独头蒜，切开。
1 pinch red pepper flakes
1掐红辣椒片。
1 big bunch kale (about 3 cups), tough sterms removed, leaves sliced into skinny bite-sized ribbons
1大串甘蓝（大概3个杯子），把硬头去掉，把剩下来的刨切到一口可以吃掉的带状。
2 tablespoons nutritional yeast
2大汤匙营养酵母。
1/2 cup white wine
1/2杯白葡萄酒。
sea salt and fresh ground pepper to taste
海盐和新鲜的胡椒作为调味料。
In a medium-sized pot, bring water or vegetable broth to boil.
选一个适中的锅，把水或蔬菜汤煮沸。
Add quinoa. Reduce heat to low and cover. Cook quinoa for about 12 to 15 minutes or until all liquid is absorbed and quinoa is plumped.
放入藜麦，换到小火并盖上盖子，煮上12到15分钟，直到所有液体都被藜麦吸收并鼓起来，关火，把它放到一边降温。

Remove from burner and set aside to cool. Place a large dry skillet over medium-high heat. Add pine nuts. Toast nuts, stirring or give pan a shake every few minutes, until nuts are golden brown and smell luscious and buttery, about 5 minutes.
换上干燥的煎锅，开中火，放入松子，翻炒，每过一分钟就摇晃摇晃，直到松子变得金黄，闻起来有松子的甘香或是黄油香。这个过程大概5分钟。
Pour pine nuts into a small bowl and set aside.
把松子倒入小碗，放到一边。
Pour the olive oil into the skillet and return to heat.
把橄榄油倒入煎锅，再加热。
Add chopped garlic and cook, stirring, until garlic turns soft and golden, about 5 minutes.
放入切过大蒜开始翻炒，直到大蒜变软、变金黄，这过程大概5分钟。
Add kale by the handful and stir until kale is just wilted, 3 to 5 minutes.
加入甘蓝翻炒，直到它刚刚好变软，大概3到5分钟。
Stir in quinoa, nutritional yeast wine and season to taste. Cook another few minutes or until heated through. Add pine nuts and toss to combine.
把藜麦、营养酵母、白葡萄酒和调味料一起加入进去，大概再炒几分钟直到彻底加热，最后再把炒过的松子倒入合并。
